Package interfaces.generalrepository

Interface IGeneralRepository

All Superinterfaces:
IGeneralRepository_Bench, IGeneralRepository_Playground, IGeneralRepository_Site, Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GeneralRepository
public interface IGeneralRepository extends IGeneralRepository_Site, IGeneralRepository_Bench, IGeneralRepository_Playground, Remote
General interface for the general repository, that extends from the general repository interfaces for the referee site, bench and the playground.
